meanings.definition: A person who shines shoes for a living.
meanings.sent1: The bootblack at the corner always has a smile for his customers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a bootblack working diligently on a pair of worn-out boots.
meanings.sent3: The bootblack joked that he could make any shoe sparkle, even a potato.
meanings.sent4: Her skills as a bootblack turned dull shoes into shining stars.
meanings.sent5: The bootblack's dedication to his craft made him a local legend.

meanings.sent1: I need to bootblack my shoes before the job interview.
meanings.sent2: She carefully bootblacked her favorite pair of boots for the party.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to bootblack their sneakers with glitter for fun.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail while bootblacking shoes impressed his customers.
meanings.sent5: The old shoes looked brand new after she bootblacked them.
